name: Nu, pagadi!
overview: Nu, pogodi! is the Soviet clone of Nintendo's Game & Watch Wide Screen: Egg. This handheld features characters (wolf and hare) from popular Soviet animated show of the same name. And this game is the C64 port of that! The player controls the wolf who needs to catch eggs sliding down conveyor belts from four directions. Each egg gives one point. If the wolf misses an egg it breaks and the player looses one of three lives. If an egg breaks when the hare is visible in the corner of the screen (the hare replaces the hen from the original game) the player only looses a half of life.There are two difficulty settings.
